website_summaries.verdict: The perfect size package if you're new to hemp seeds and want a smaller size to sample.
pros: We found the typical nutty flavor that comes with hemp seeds to be prominent in this brand
Unlike other hemp seeds, there was no sour aftertaste with Bob's Red Mill
The flavor pairs wonderfully with Greek yogurt
cons: The package is quite small (8 oz.)
If you know you like hemp seeds, a larger bag that will last longer might be the way to go

customer_reviews.title: great addition for a healthy lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: After a bad run in with some yucky tasting protein powder I decided to give hemp seeds a try to add to my shakes. They are loaded with all your essential amino acids so I figured it has to be almost if not better than protein powder! I have been using the hemp seeds for a little over a week daily now, and I love them. I feel full to the point that when lunch comes, I sometimes only eat because I know I need to and not because I am hungry. They kind of have a slight nutty taste to them but it is not overpowering at all.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Proulx

customer_reviews.title: Great Delivery!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in great time and fresh...tastes a little like sunflower seeds when you eat them alone. I have eaten them that way as well as sprinkled into a cup of pudding and in an egg cheese and potato bowl and they were easy and pleasant in all. I have only had them a couple of days so I really can't say what the effects will be but I do think I am sleeping better.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Bob Red Mill for the win
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of these Hemp seeds. Perfect addition to oatmeal, cream of wheat, pancakes, or whatever else you desire. I also just eat them right out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Chet U.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! So hard to find in stores around here. I have yogurt with my own "seed mix" (chia, flax, hemp) for breakfast. The size, color, and texture of Bob's hemp hearts is consistent pack after pack. If you're looking for good-quality hemp seeds, these are the ones you want.
customer_reviews.author: CEBee

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with flaxseed meal and chia seeds mixed in my oatmeal every morning to help with joint pain and blood sugar control.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora

customer_reviews.title: These are fresh and delivered to the door
customer_reviews.text: Sure beats going to the store to purchase them. Same price either way. Lasts a long time in our home.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: tasty Selection
customer_reviews.text: Very tatsy! I can;t describe the taste accurately. It's sort of nut and adds to my salads and yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: George Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find this product locally
customer_reviews.text: Am appreciative of being able to find and purchase this quality Bob's Red Mill product on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki A. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Good protein
customer_reviews.text: I add to yogurt or oatmeal or anything. Hard protein tastes fine. Ty
customer_reviews.author: Mary Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and good for you!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this stuff! Delicious and versatile, you can throw a couple tablespoons in just about anything. Besides the obvious yogurt and smoothies, I've also put hemp seeds in things like meatloaf and muffins. My kids love it in oatmeal, plus it's super nutritious. They are addicting, but no they won't get you "high".
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Drees

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Seed
customer_reviews.text: Started using This recently can't really vouch for the product at this time. Not totally certain what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: SColby

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! Quality for good price
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Quality for good price. So good in smoothies and on oatmeal and yogurt/granola! Highly highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quick service & good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I was very please with the speed that product arrived & the quality. I had never tried this before but it is a pleasant nutty taste. You can eat it plain or add it to lots of things. I keep it in the refrigerator & some in the freezer until I am ready for it. I have ordered from this company before & have always been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and healthy. Use this instead of fish oil for omegas.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Small seed with big nutritional impact
customer_reviews.text: I have added these to just about everything, smoothies, salads, edamame hummus, guacamole.. and it blends well without altering the taste of the food. Great investment for the health benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Great energy booster and a great source of vegan protein. Very very filling so I only use a table spoon in my smoothies. Another bonus is Bob's brand. I don't think I have gotten a sub-standard product from them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Lin

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and great protein for smoothies and oatmeal.
customer_reviews.text: I am a returning customer of this product. I have this on my reorder wish list that I created. Highly recommended. Thanks for carrying it, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mirly

customer_reviews.title: By far the best Hemp seed I have tried!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hemp Seeds for many months now and have tried several of the top brands for same on Amazon and in the health stores. Each and every one had small hard pieces or hull pieces in the packages. Bob's however is by far the best as none of that is in this product. It tastes great and I wouldn't think of ever purchasing another brand. Yes it is a little more expensive but it is worth it if you don't like eating those hull and hard pieces of whatever is included in the others. Enjoy and try this one.
customer_reviews.author: MrGman

customer_reviews.title: Ordering More!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product ordering more soon. I use it in my yogurt & salads nice flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Only Bob's Red Mill brand for my use
customer_reviews.text: Bob's Red Mill is a trusted brand and only brand I purchase. Added to my smoothies daily, giving my body that extra immune boost is rewarding. Goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: JGriffith

customer_reviews.title: These are fresh and taste good.
customer_reviews.text: Some other brands of hemp seeds taste nasty. These are good. I have tried several kinds (fortunately the first kind I tried was good or I'd never eaten them again).
customer_reviews.author: human

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh. I use in my yogurt, oatmeal ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh. I use in my yogurt, oatmeal, and in some cookies I make. I store the extra in the freezer. When I get it out to use there is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, mixes easily and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, mixes easily and easy to store. Love the complete nutrition in such a small package. Will continue to improve my eating habits with this hemp seed.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan C. Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Super food. If you need Omega 3 and Omega ...
customer_reviews.text: Super food. If you need Omega 3 and Omega 6, this is your food---not to mention it removes any need for a laxative!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy R Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & Tasty
customer_reviews.text: The seeds are great in salads. I put them in pancakes, waffles, bread and other home made goodies. It is a way to get something healthy into the kids without effort.
customer_reviews.author: GKK

customer_reviews.title: This really is as great as others have posted
customer_reviews.text: This really is as great as others have posted. The biggest difference is that the seeds taste fresh, no hulls or hard bits. I purchased another brand after this and was very disappointed. I have returned to Bob and will never leave him.
customer_reviews.author: VANCE NORUM

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Decent price for great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Decent price for great product! This item is hard to find near me and the price is comparable to what stores charge!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: High quality seeds
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described: hulled hemp seed hearts. I blended them with water to make creamy hemp seed milk.
customer_reviews.author: Tao Neuendorffer Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Hulled seeds
customer_reviews.text: Pretty tasty. It is a shame that hemp seeds are so tiny. Other than that, a good product. Next time I make muffins, I'll be adding these to the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Buddha

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Started adding hemp hearts to my daily diet and was very happy to find this good buy and Prime on top of that!
customer_reviews.author: Dee M

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cookies!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make paleo breakfast cookies! So yummy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily in my smoothies. Quality, fresh product.
customer_reviews.author: Cd Cotn

customer_reviews.title: Very good & nutritous
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my gluten free breads, cookies, and muffins and even sprinkle on fruit and/or vegetable salads. Adds a nice taste as well as nutritional value.
customer_reviews.author: raggmopp

customer_reviews.title: Adding more seeds to my diet
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Like Bob's Red Mill products.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Hulled Hemp Seeds
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Fast shipper. Organic. Tasty. Yummy. Goes with almost everything! We sprinkle it on Sorbet even best on soups or salads or breads.
customer_reviews.author: Rkrupka1

customer_reviews.title: Great new product from a great old company
customer_reviews.text: best new product. we love it just like we love all Bob's stuff. great products and a great company.
customer_reviews.author: alan a

customer_reviews.title: Tasty way to add protein & fiber!
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle these seeds on oatmeal, salads, dips, just about anything that could use a little extra texture. Very tasty and good for you too!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Hemp seed, trial run
customer_reviews.text: Good price, hope it works! Looking for products that assist in weight lost, internet info indicates that Hemp is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these seeds... they have a nutty taste and are healthy for you. Great for smoothies and easy to add to any dish.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: We eat this every morning on our cereal This is the best price we have found (getting 5 products every 2 months...)
customer_reviews.author: kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to your diet
customer_reviews.text: Hemp seeds are delicious and a great healthful addition to your diet. They tasted pretty good, similar to a sunflower seed but about the size of a poppy seed. My only complaint is that I had read about using them for weight loss and how they would keep you full for hours yet after eating nearly 6 tablespoons of them with my breakfast I still found no difference in my appetite and was as hungry as usual come late morning. I still plan on keeping them in my diet as they are a great superfood though!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I love these hemp seeds
customer_reviews.text: I love these hemp seeds. I put them on my yogurt, mixed with a little almond butter + stevia and serve it over berries. Yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!! and all Bob's Red Mill products for that matter!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hulled hemp seed is delicious!!!! To me it's reminiscent of finely chopped slightly toasted pecans. I store in the pantry and haven't had any problem though to keep freshness I might begin storing in an airtight container or freezer. I eat by the spoonfuls. I've also added to fruit smoothies and salads with no difference in taste. Very high quality. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Garysgal888

customer_reviews.title: On the go energy.
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly, these are good. Moist, nutty, and light. I’ve started putting them in just about everything: oatmeal, smoothies, salads, soup. You name it. Plus, they’re little power-packed seeds of nutrition. Thanks to Bob’s Red Mill for making these available.
customer_reviews.author: trashycuz

customer_reviews.title: Hemp seeds 4-27-2013
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost done with the first bag in the 4 pack, I like them very much. I use them to sprinkle on salad, ice cream, and a bunch in the kale shakes I started having a few times a week. This is only the second brand of seeds I have tried, so I dont have a lot to compare them to. But I don't think I need to try any other.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Bob's Red Mill Hulled Hemp Seed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Has a nutty flavor and is very nutritious.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Brotzman

customer_reviews.title: Take every day!
customer_reviews.text: I use Bob's Red Mill Hulled Hemp Seed in my home made cereal, along with other nuts and seeds, every morning. Get recipe here:
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Bob's Red Mill is such a great brand and their hemp seeds are good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bob's Red Mill is such a great brand and their hemp seeds are good quality. Packaging and delivery of this item worked and it's a sturdy box to keep them in- although when we get a bunch at once like this, we keep them in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Supplement
customer_reviews.text: We use this product each morning at breakfast time as an added source of essential Omega 3 and 6 along with helpful amino acids. The supplier through Amazon provided easy ording process, saving us a trip to the local Health Food CO-OP. Our order arrived in excellent shape and well before the anticipated delivery date. The supplier's price is very competative compared to local venders.
customer_reviews.author: Karl W.

customer_reviews.title: Hemp seeds
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Put them in my yogurt they add fiber, flavor and some substance to it so I feel more full.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Seed or ground?
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were going to be hulled seeds but it is a ground powder. I have not tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lizasstuff

customer_reviews.title: Quality is excellent. Flavor is like pine nuts
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy at Whole Foods but they no longer carry. I was told because Bob’s Red Mill could not supply all W F stores.
customer_reviews.author: yogi

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: Good protein, nutty flavor, low carbs. I use this on top of cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Ludwika Goodson

product_meta.title: Bob's Red Mill Hulled Hemp Seed Hearts, 8-ounce
product_meta.description: Size:8 Ounce (Pack of 1)Bob's Red Mill works hard to ensure the highest quality by maintaining a close relationship with our products, every step of the way. Our relationship starts at the source-with the farmer who produces the grain. We maintain personal relationships with farmers all around the country and make an effort to visit their farms. Together, we ensure that we're offering the best product available, while always using best practices.
feature_bullets: Excellent source of iron, zinc, and magnesium
